Class UserInterface

java.lang.Object
UserInterface
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, EventListener
public class UserInterface extends Object implements ActionListener
Cette classe implémente une interface utilisateur graphique simple avec une zone de saisie de texte, une zone de sortie de texte et une image optionnelle.
Version:
2026
Author:
CLEMENT RUAN

  • Constructor Details

    • UserInterface

      public UserInterface(GameEngine pGameEngine)
      Construct a UserInterface. As a parameter, a Game Engine (an object processing and executing the game commands) is needed.
      Parameters:
      pGameEngine - The GameEngine object implementing the game logic.

    • enable

      public void enable(boolean pOnOff)
      Enable or disable input in the entry field.
      Parameters:
      pOnOff - True active les entrées, False désactive

    • processCommand

      private void processCommand()
      A command has been entered in the entry field. Read the command and do whatever is necessary to process it.
